WorkItem.Summary: [Buffs] Blessing of Kings tooltip display bug

Comments.Message: So what's the bug? I understand that it looks odd from a user point of view at first, but it calculates right, and it's pretty obvious once a user looks at it for a second.
(And doesn't matter anyway, since aren't they making Kings trainable in 3.1 finally?)
The bug is that EVERY user would expect improved Blessing of kings tooltip to show +10% to all stats not +7.84% so its a tooltip display bug, the calculation is accurate.
